body:
The good news is v7 doesn't have this problem: https://codesandbox.io/s/hook-form-nested-field-array-forked-ud19v?file=/src/App.js (same `unset` function)

i will take a look for a solution.

Thanks a lot for the investigation @leapful üëç 

`unset(fieldArrayValuesRef, name); ` what a mistake...
@leapful i just quick tested with your fix above: https://codesandbox.io/s/hook-form-nested-field-array-forked-2or6p?file=/src/App.js functional test pass.
Do you want to send a PR @leapful since you are the one (once again) solves the puzzle?

@bluebill1049 

Okie, I will open a pull request. BTW, shall we update the method "unset" too (At least for the current v6) ? Because in your quick fix CSB sample https://codesandbox.io/s/hook-form-nested-field-array-forked-2or6p?file=/src/App.js, re-adding child after first removing will get undefined error as the array value is empty array with length = 1.

> @bluebill1049
> 
> Okie, I will open a pull request. BTW, shall we update the method "unset" too (At least for the current v6) ? Because in your quick fix CSB sample https://codesandbox.io/s/hook-form-nested-field-array-forked-2or6p?file=/src/App.js, re-adding child after first removing will get undefined error as the array value is empty array with length = 1.

sounds good to me! üëç

Hi there, first of all thanks for this awesome library.
Just wanted to let you know this issue is still happening on v6.15.4
